## 1.5

### a

$$

&= \$ 1240
\end{aligned}
$$

### c

$$
\begin{aligned}
A(4) &= 1000 \times (1 + 0.06) ^ 4 \\
&= 1000 \times (1.262) \\
&= \$ 1262
\end{aligned}
$$

### d

$$
\begin{aligned}
r^{(4)} &= 0.06
i(t) &= {1 + \frac{r^{(m)}}{m}}^ {m} - 1 \\
&= {1 + \frac{0.06}{4}}^ {4} - 1 \\
&= {1 + 0.015}^ {4} - 1 \\
&= 0.0614
A(4) &= 1000 \times (1 + 0.0614) ^ 4 \\
&= 1000 \times (1.269) \\
&= \$ 1269
\end{aligned}
$$

### e

$$
\begin{aligned}
d^{(12)} &= 0.06
i(t) &= {1 - \frac{d^{(m)}}{m}}^ {-m} - 1 \\
&= {1 - \frac{0.06}{12}}^ {-12} - 1 \\
&= {1 - 0.005}^ {-12} - 1 \\
&= 0.0620
A(4) &= 1000 \times (1 + 0.0620) ^ 4 \\
&= 1000 \times (1.272) \\
&= \$ 1272
\end{aligned}
$$

### f

$$
\begin{aligned}
A(4) &= 1000 \times e ^ {\delta t} \\
&= 1000 \times e ^ {0.06 \times 4} \\
&= 1000 \times e ^ {0.24} \\
&= 1000 \times (1.271) \\
&= \$ 1271
\end{aligned}
$$
